price: Ka ce: "Wanda ya kasance a cikin ɓata sai Mai rahama Ya yalwata masa yalwatãwa, har idan sun ga abin da ake yi musu wa'adi, imma azãba kõ sã'a, to zã su sani, wane ne yake shĩ ne, mafi sharri ga wuri, kuma mafi rauni ga runduna!"
arabic: قُلۡ مَن كَانَ فِي ٱلضَّلَٰلَةِ فَلۡيَمۡدُدۡ لَهُ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مَدًّاۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ شَرّٞ مَّكَانٗا وَأَضۡعَفُ جُندٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul man kāna fī al-ḍalālati falyamdud lahu al-raḥmānu maddan ḥattā idhā ra-aw mā yūʿadūna immā al-ʿadhāba wa-immā al-sāʿata fasayaʿlamūna man huwa sharrun makānan wa-aḍʿafu jundan
